metadata.title: CVE-2020-3898 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation. Thisissue is fixed in macOS Catalina 10.15.4. An application may be able togain elevated privileges.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-3898` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
cups-bsd - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
cups-client - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
cups-common - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
cups-core-drivers - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
cups-daemon - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
cups-ipp-utils - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
cups-ppdc - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
cups-server-common - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
libcups2 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
libcupscgi1 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
libcupsimage2 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
libcupsmime1 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
libcupsppdc1 - 2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cups package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.3-4ubuntu0.11').
